title: what fonts are used in this logo?
content:
The "ILANO" seems to be like Futura squished and with the edges of the letters angled (in Futura the lower part of the L does that already) and with the A missing the crossbeam, but I'm not sure.

"RISTORANTE ITALIANO" - Impact?

The M looks like a squished Times New Roman?
